issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.2.168 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:

AdGuard Social Media

It has been reported here - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/917

If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Unfortunately, there is no acceess to the site. Try to leave only AdGuard Base, update it, clear browser data, restart it, open the site.
If you still get this, do this:
- Open the filtering log and keep it in the background
- Reproduce the problem
- Switch to the filtering log
- Do screenshots of the blocked requests (you can press on the same modifier there) and send them here.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://store-jp.nintendo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstore-jp.nintendo.com%2F) ### Comment > AdGuard 追跡防止フィルタ を有効にすると問題が発生する。 > > https://store-jp.nintendo.com/on/demandware.store/Sites-MNS-Site/ja_JP/CSRF-Fail にリダイレクトされるか、無限にリロードが繰り返される。「キャッシュクリアや、Cookieを消すことで症状が改善されることもあるが一時的である。その時は解決しても根本の問題は治っていないため症状は再発する。」← これを忘れないでいただきたい。 > > 症状を記録した動画をアップロードするので確認していただきたい。 > https://streamable.com/pog0th > https://streamable.com/avu03q > > 日本語のウェブサイトであることから Yuki2718 氏による対応を願いたい。 ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Temporal workaround could be
```
@@||store-jp.nintendo.com^$cookie,badfilter
$cookie=/dwac_/,badfilter
$cookie=/dwac_/,domain=~store-jp.nintendo.com
$cookie=/^_ga_/,badfilter
$cookie=/^_ga_/,domain=~store-jp.nintendo.com
```
